short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to copy the email address of the sender in Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥 Copy the sender's email with the click of a button (in Gmail) 🔥

This extension only does one thing, it adds a button that copies the email address of the sender!

🏰 STORY TIME 🏰
⚔️ We spent an hour creating this extension, to save 2 seconds every time we want to copy the sender's email address. Why? We want to copy it quite often! Usually to add the sender to a CRM, or search for the sender in our inbox. It made sense for us to finally add a copy button where we need it the most, next to the sender's email address. With this extension... we also want YOU to save 2 seconds!

💻 How to use the extension:
🔸Add the extension
🔸Open a conversation/email in Gmail
🔸Click your new copy button
🔸Voilá! The sender's email address way now copied.

❓ Frequently asked questions:

📌 What does this extension do?
- It copies the sender's email address.

📌 Do you save any data?
- No

📌 How does it work?
- When you open a conversation/email in Gmail, the extension will look for the sender's email address. Two pixels to the right, it will add a nice and clean copy button. If you would click this button (we recommend you do), you will copy the sender's email address!

📪 Contact us:
Do you have any suggestions of how we can improve the plugin? Let us know!

Gmail mockup created with https://www.figma.com/community/file/1023006155932070158/free-gmail-gui-inbox-2021
